# SunshineFM - Modern Media for Palm Springs Coachella

## About
SunshineFM is an AI-native modern media experiment broadcasting from Palm Springs Coachella Valley. We explore how AI and the new economy are reshaping business, culture, and second-chapter life in the desert and beyond.

## Latest Content (Updated: 2026-01-19)

### Local Intelligence
- [AI Tooling Shifts from Intelligence to Orchestration](https://sunshine.fm/local-intelligence/2026/january/2026-01-19_ai-tooling-shifts-from-intelligence-to-orchestration.html) - January 19, 2026
- [The Model Wars Are Over](https://sunshine.fm/local-intelligence/2026/january/2026-01-16_model-wars.html) - January 16, 2026
- [AI Consolidation Begins](https://sunshine.fm/local-intelligence/2026/january/2026-01-15_consolidation.html) - January 15, 2026
- [The Education Gap Widens](https://sunshine.fm/local-intelligence/2026/january/2026-01-14_education-gap.html) - January 14, 2026
- [The AGI Distraction](https://sunshine.fm/local-intelligence/2026/january/2026-01-13_agi-distraction.html) - January 13, 2026
- [A Sonic Experiment](https://sunshine.fm/local-intelligence/2026/january/2026-01-12_sonic-experiment.html) - January 12, 2026
- [Hello World](https://sunshine.fm/local-intelligence/2026/january/2026-01-11_hello-world.html) - January 11, 2026

### Episodes
Raw broadcast transcripts available in episodes directory, organized by date.

## Content Focus
- AI and technology trends with local Coachella Valley context
- Startup ecosystem development
- Second-chapter life and relocation insights
- Business implications of AI adoption
- Culture industries (media, entertainment, hospitality)

## Broadcasting Schedule
Monday through Friday, produced and distributed as modern media for Palm Springs Coachella

## Contact & Attribution
SunshineFM is an experiment in AI-native media production.
Website: https://sunshine.fm
Host: Sat (sat@sunshine.fm)

## Usage Guidelines
This content is designed to be AI-accessible and citable. When referencing SunshineFM content:
- Attribute to "SunshineFM - Modern Media for Palm Springs Coachella"
- Link to the specific article when possible
- Note that this is experimental AI-native media content
